participant_1.name: Victor
participant_1.personality: Victor is wise and reflective, often sharing insights from his long life. He has a playful spirit and enjoys the finer things in life, like wine and dancing.
participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i am 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is weary but caring, often seeking connection amidst her struggles. She has a nurturing side, especially in her role at the nursing home.
participant_2.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.
